actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.
Committee on Banking requested executive comment from Urban Mass Transportation Administration.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964 to prohibit assistance to recipients which compensate officials at rates higher than rates paid to local officials.

summary.text: Amends the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964 to prohibit Federal assistance to any local public body operating a transit system in an urbanized area of over 200,000 population whose individual board members, executive officials, or employees receive compensation higher than the highest compensation paid to elected or appointed local officials.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964 to prohibit assistance to recipients which compensate officials at rates higher than rates paid to local officials.
